content.webTitle: Send your questions to James Naughtie

fields.headline: Send your questions to James Naughtie
fields.bodyText: James Naughtie, presenter of the Today programme and author of The Rivals, a new book exploring the relationship between Tony Blair and Gordon Brown, will be online at 1pm on Tuesday October 2 live from the Labour conference in Brighton. Read about his new book here. Go to our talkboard and post your questions here. Or, if you prefer, email your question to politics.editor@guardianunlimited.co.uk
